pr_title: Sb bazel fix mixed tags on620

timeline.message: fix(bazel): maven_install: loosen up the regex trimming tag text before maven_coordinates to correctly omit other types of tags in the tag array. Fixes IDETECT-1925.

timeline.bodyText:
I think we should make a utility method to create this so we don't have the newlines and the + signs.
private static final String CQUERY_OUTPUT_MIXED_TAGS = createOutput("java_import(",
                                                        "  name = \"sso-adminsdk\",",
                                                        "  tags = [\"__SOME_OTHER_TAG__\"],",
                                                        "  generator_name = \"sso-adminsdk\",",
timeline.author: taikuukaits
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -104,35 +104,97 @@
                                                    + "  deps = [],\n"
                                                    + ")\n";
 
+    private static final String CQUERY_OUTPUT_MIXED_TAGS = "java_import(\n"
